Text: Dominions Investment Review Presentation for February If you are interested in an overview of Dominions assets and projected earnings you can review these by clicking on the below web address investorspresentationshtml Greg Hathaway Office Phone Virginia Power Energy Marketing Dominion Blvd Glen Allen Virginia Fax
Cc Greg Hathaway Office Phone Virginia Power Energy Marketing Dominion Blvd Glen Allen Virginia Fax

Re Demarc Allocation Conference Call Cc JasonHilllaryMarcMarkStacy Please mark this time on your calendar so we all know how this is going to work Vernon Please be prepared to discuss How we have our pools set up should help us or hurt us Beatrice fits into the picture and if this is going to cause additional allocations If Demarc gets allocated are big contract gets frozen so we can not adjust our nominations If this is the case should we release our contract to ourselves in the field zone so we would then have two contracts which would allow us to not have the same problem as described above Review the amount of capacity to and through Demarc by line Specific example that includes all the cycles Can you have an allocation after the timely cycle Our priority going to Demarc from the Field if we have our nominations in on time and do not change them What would happen if we were on time and got all of our gas confirmed to Demarc and then one of our customers changes their nomination in our pool Greg Hathaway Office Phone Virginia Power Energy Marketing Dominion Blvd Glen Allen Virginia Fax Mercaldo Vernon VernonMercaldo enroncom PM To Greg ANCPOWER cc Blair Lynn Kowalke Terry Medeles Gerry Williams Jo Buchanan John Subject Demarc Allocation Conference Call Greg Looks like CST EST on Tuesday November is good from this side Let me know if this is good from your side and we will schedule accordingly Thanks Vernon This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the Re Demarc Allocation Conference Call Cc Thanks for the clarification On number is still a little fuzzy Does Demarc Deff get allocated during the same cycle as Demarc Seems unlikely since Demarc Deff is a storage pt and storage is allocated at a different time If we were nominating our Firm from Beatrice to Demarc Deff where would our customers pull from The storage that is offered by NNGs park and ride is at what location Demarc or Demarc Deff Greg Hathaway Office Phone Virginia Power Energy Marketing Dominion Blvd Glen Allen Virginia Fax Blair Lynn Lynn nroncom PM To Greg ANCPOWER Brent ANCPOWER Gregg ANCPOWER Hillary ANCPOWER Jason J ANCPOWER M Lynn ANCPOWER Mark ANCPOWER Stacy ANCPOWER cc Mercaldo Vernon Blair Lynn Medeles Gerry Kowalke Terry Williams Jo Buchanan John January Steve Subject Demarc Allocation Conference Call Greg it was good to visit with you yesterday Here are the questions and answers that we promised you at the conference call on Tuesday November Please review and let Vernon or I know if you need any clarification What fields can be changed on a nomination and the nomination still keep its flowing gas rights from the previous cycle Answer QUANTITY volume equal to scheduled amount or volume lower than scheduled amount RANK changed to a different number Where can I find information on Imbalance Tiering in relation to mandatory monthly cash out Answer Tariff Sheet D E What points are in the grouping to determine a demarc allocation Answer Beatrice Trailblazer and demarc are the only two points in the group If Virgina Power is transporting gas to demarc and demarc is allocated can Virginia Power switch their nomination to demarc deferred delivery and keep their gas flowing Answer The field Receipt to demarc deffered delivery IS included in a demarc allocation because the transport tied to this storage nomination is physically coming from the field to the market area Greg we may not have been clear on this comment on the conference call
